name: Clinical Curers
description:
Clinical Curers is a fast-paced crazy couch co-op party game for up to four players. You have to work as a team to cure the incoming patients from the infections they have contracted in a timely and calm manor.

Clinical Curers is inspired by many other party games such as Overcooked, Gang Beasts, SpeedRunners and many more. This game was my final year university project which overtime I fell in love with and wanted to develop more. The core gameplay features of the game are already implemented meaning the game is already playable.

The game is 80% complete and only requires code refactoring, new 3D models and sound design. Playtesting to find bugs will be required and will be tested by the developer and backers in later stages.

The game is on kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/wesbroom/clinical-curers
